title: Ignition Transport along with gazebo includes

content.html:
I want to be able to subscribe to a ignition transport topic within code that may have gazebo transport nodes. Is this possible ? I have my source and cmake files attached. I am using Gazebo 7.15. Please advise. How do I include custom messages without doing a protobuf compilation for all messages ?

Here is the error log I am getting on make

‌

Scanning dependencies of target velodyne_plugin
[ 50%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/velodyne_plugin.dir/velodyne_plugin.cc.o
